topic.title: Discuss (U8): Climate Change & the "Disruption" Movie
topic.text:
Share your thoughts about the Disruption movie: Please Note - "Community" may refer to your personal community or to the Dominican community.

  • What did you think about the movie? Did watching it did it make you feel motivated to make a change, or was the message too biased for your taste? Which issues in the film are most relevant to you and your community? Explain.
  • Indicate whether you would ever host a viewing of the movie to have discussion or organize other direct steps that you could take (e.g. the movie gives some examples of marches, etc.; and identify existing organizations, allies and campaigns near you.)
  • Research, identify and describe some examples of efforts made towards a renewable energy future in your community.

Initial Posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59 pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59 pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.

I hope you've enjoyed the course and feel that you have learned quite a bit more about the earth!
